casebody.data:
BEEM USA LIMITED-LIABILITY LIMITED PARTNERSHIP, et al.
v.
GRAX CONSULTING LLC 360A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 20, 2018 Camden R. Webb, Attorney at Law, Lauren E. Fussell, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Beem USA Limited-Liability Limited Partnership, et al. Mason Shane Boyd, Registered Agent, for Grax Consulting LLC.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of November 2018 by Plaintiffs:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of November 2018."

Plaintiffs shall have up to and including the 27th day of November 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
